title: Can the C2860 support modem data service ?
answer:
The C2860 supports CDMA 2000 1X packet data services. The C2860 can act as a 153.6 k bit/s modem when it is connected to a computer.
Do the following to use the C2860 as a modem:
Step 1 Set the data service call code for the C2860.
Step 2 Install the universal serial bus (USB) driver on a computer, and then configure the dialing software embedded in the Windows operating service.
Step 3 Initiate dialing from the computer.
Step 4 Access the Internet after obtaining the IP address.
